item.title: How Do You Use Owncast?
item.description: Could you take a second and answer two very short questions to help influence the future of Owncast? We want to build things that are most useful to you, but to do that we’d like to hear, generally, what category of streaming you’ve been using Owncast for. Answer here. Your time and feedback is much appreciated!

item.title: Join us January 17th for the first Owncast Call of 2022
item.description: On January 17th we’ll be getting together to chat about Owncast and you’re invited. 12PM Pacific time, but find your local time here. Join the call at https://meet.jit.si/owncast-discovery-meeting. If you’re currently a user of Owncast, a person who’s interested in being involved, or are just curious what the project is up to, we’d love to have you join us. You’re welcome to quietly listen, or be as involved as you like.
